title: LinkedIn Jobs Scraper Input
description: Provide LinkedIn job search URLs or keywords to scrape job listings along with company details.

startUrls.title: LinkedIn Search URLs
startUrls.description: Go to LinkedIn jobs search page (https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/search/), apply your filters, copy the full URL from the address bar and paste here. You can add multiple URLs.

searchKeywords.title: Search Keywords (Alternative)
searchKeywords.description: Alternative to Start URLs: provide keywords to search (e.g., 'software engineer', 'data scientist'). Will be used only if no Start URLs are provided.

searchLocation.title: Search Location (Alternative)
searchLocation.description: Location for keyword search (e.g., 'United States', 'London'). Used with Search Keywords.

maxItems.title: Max Items
maxItems.description: Maximum number of job listings to scrape. LinkedIn limits search results to ~1000 per query. Use 'Split search by location' to get more.

scrapeCompany.title: Scrape Company Details
scrapeCompany.description: Scrape additional company information (description, website, employee count). This makes the scraper slower but provides richer data.

scrapeJobDetails.title: Scrape Full Job Details
scrapeJobDetails.description: Fetch full job description, poster info, and application details for each listing. Disabling this only returns card-level data but is much faster.

splitSearchByLocation.title: Split Search URLs by Location
splitSearchByLocation.description: LinkedIn limits results to ~1000 jobs per search. Enable this to automatically split your search into multiple city-level searches within the target country to get more results. Ignores duplicate jobs automatically.

targetCountry.title: Target Country (for Split Search)
targetCountry.description: Country to split searches by city. Required when 'Split search by location' is enabled.

datePosted.title: Date Posted Filter
datePosted.description: On LinkedIn jobs search page, select the Date filter and copy the search URL. Or use this to override.

proxy.title: Proxy Configuration
proxy.description: Proxy settings. Residential proxies recommended for best results.
